transliteration.hi: कहूँ जटाधारी कहूँ कंठी धरे ब्रहमचारी कहूँ जोग साधी कहूँ साधना करत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں جٹادھاریِ کهُوں کںٹھیِ دھرے برهمچاریِ کهُوں جوگ سادھیِ کهُوں سادھنا کرت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM kwn Pwry khUM fMfI huie pDwry khUM PUk PUk pwvn kau ipRQI pY Drq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art a Kanphata Yougi and somewhere Thou roamest like a Dandi saint, somewhere Thou steppest on the earth very cautiously.

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) kaan faare kahoo(n) dda(n)ddee hui padhaare kahoo(n) fook fook paavan kau pirathee pai dharat ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ कान फारे कहूँ डंडी हुइ पधारे कहूँ फूक फूक पावन कउ पृथी पै धरत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں کان پھارے کهُوں ڈںڈیِ هُا پدھارے کهُوں پھُوک پھُوک پاون کا پرتھیِ پَے دھرت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kqhUM ispwhI huie kY swDq islwhn kO khUM CqRI huie kY Ar mwrq mrq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere becoming a soldier, Thou practisest arms and somewhere becoming a kshatriya, Thou slayest the enemy or be slayed Thyself.

transliteration.hi: कतहूँ सिपाही हुइ कै साधत सिलाहन कौ कहूँ छत्री हुइ कै अर मारत मरत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کتهُوں سپاهیِ هُا کَے سادھت سلاهن کَو کهُوں چھتریِ هُا کَے ار مارت مرت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM BUm Bwr kO auqwrq ho mhwrwj khUM Bv BUqn kI Bwvnw Brq ho ]5]15]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou removest the burden of the earth, O Supreme Sovereign! And somewhere Thou the wishes of the worldly beings. 5.15.

pu.ss: ikqy mhwrwjy dw rUp Dwr ky DrqI auproN zulm dy Bwr nUM auqwrdy ho Aqy ikqy jgq dy jIvw dI ie`Cw nUM pUrw krdy ho ]5]15]
pu.bdb: ikqy mhwrwjy dw rUp Dwr ky DrqI auproN zulm dy Bwr nUM auqwrdy ho Aqy ikqy jgq dy jIvw dI ie`Cw nUM pUrw krdy ho ]5]15]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bhoom bhaar kau utaarat ho mahaaraaj kahoo(n) bhav bhootan kee bhaavanaa bharat ho ||5||15||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ भूम भार कौ उतारत हो महाराज कहूँ भव भूतन की भावना भरत हो ॥५॥१५॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بھُوم بھار کَو اُتارت هو مهاراج کهُوں بھو بھُوتن کیِ بھاونا بھرت هو ۔۔۵۔۔۱۵۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM gIq nwd ky indwn kO bqwvq ho khUM inRqkwrI icqRkwrI ky inDwn ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou elucidatest the traits of song and sound and somewhere Thou art the treasure of dancing and painting.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN gIq Aqy nwd dy FMgw ('indwn') nUM dsx vwly ho Aqy ikqy nwc klw Aqy ic`qrklw dy BMfwr ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) geet naadh ke nidhaan kau bataavat ho kahoo(n) niratakaaree chitrakaaree ke nidhaan ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ गीत नाद के निदान कौ बतावत हो कहूँ नृतकारी चित्रकारी के निधान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں گیِت ناد کے ندان کَو بتاوت هو کهُوں نرتکاریِ چترکاریِ کے ندھان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kqhUM pXUK huie kY pIvq ipvwvq ho kqhUM mXUK aUK khUM md pwn ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art ambrosia which Thou drinkest and causest to drink, somewhere Thou art honey and sugarcane juice and somewhere Thou seemest intoxicated with wine.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN AMimRq AQvw som rs ('pXUK') ho ky (aus nUM) pINdy Aqy iplwdy ho Aqy ikqy qusIN mwKIauW Aqy ikqy gMny dw rs ho Aqy ikqy midrw dw pwn krn vwly ho।

transliteration.en: katahoo(n) payookh hui kai peevat pivaavat ho katahoo(n) mayookh uookh kahoo(n) madh paan ho ||
transliteration.hi: कतहूँ पयूख हुइ कै पीवत पिवावत हो कतहूँ मयूख ऊख कहूँ मद पान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کتهُوں پےُوکھ هُا کَے پیِوت پواوت هو کتهُوں مےُوکھ اُوکھ کهُوں مد پان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM mhw sUr huie kY mwrq mvwsn kO khUM mhwdyv dyvqwn ky smwn ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere, becoming a great warrior Thou slayeth the enemies and somewhere Thou art like the chief gods.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN mhwn sUrmy bx ky bwZIAW ('mvwsn') nUM mwrdy ho Aqy ikqy qusIN dyviqAW dy vI mhw dyv vrgy ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) mahaa soor hui kai maarat mavaasan kau kahoo(n) mahaadhev dhevataan ke samaan ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ महा सूर हुइ कै मारत मवासन कौ कहूँ महादेव देवतान के समान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں مها سُور هُا کَے مارت مواسن کَو کهُوں مهادےو دےوتان کے سمان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM mhwdIn khUM dRb ky ADIn khUM ibidAw mY pRbIn khUM BUm khUM Bwn ho ]6]16]

en.bdb: Somewhere thou art very humble, somewhere Thou art full of ego, somewhere Thou art an adept in learning, somewhere Thou art earth and somewhere Thou art the sun. 6.16.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN Aiq kMgwl ho Aqy ikqy DnwF ho, ikqy ividAw ivc pRbIn ho Aqy ikqy DrqI Aqy ikqy sUrj ho ]6]16]
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN Aiq kMgwl ho Aqy ikqy DnwF ho, ikqy ividAw ivc pRbIn ho Aqy ikqy DrqI Aqy ikqy sUrj ho ]6]16]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) mahaadheen kahoo(n) dhrab ke adheen kahoo(n) bidhiaa mai prabeen kahoo(n) bhoom kahoo(n) bhaan ho ||6||16||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ महादीन कहूँ द्रब के अधीन कहूँ बिदिआ मै प्रबीन कहूँ भूम कहूँ भान हो ॥६॥१६॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں مهادیٍن کهُوں درب کے ادھیٍن کهُوں بدآ مَے پربیٍن کهُوں بھُوم کهُوں بھان هو ۔۔۶۔۔۱۶۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM AklMk khUM mwrq mXMk khUM pUrn pRjMk khUM s`uDqw kI swr ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art without any blemish, somewhere Thou smitest the moon, somewhere Thou art completely engrossed in enjoyment on Thy couch and somewhere Thou art the essence of Purity.

pu.ss: (hy pRBU!) qusIN ikqy klMk qoN ibnw ho Aqy ikqy cMdRmw ('mXMk') nUM mwrn vwly (klMikq krn vwly goqm irSI) ho, ikqy qusIN iesqrI sihq plMG vwly (igRhsqI) ho Aqy ikqy qusIN Su`Dqw dw swr-q`qÍ ho (ArQwq suK suivDw qoN pry ho)
pu.bdb: (hy pRBU!) qusIN ikqy klMk qoN ibnw ho Aqy ikqy cMdRmw ('mXMk') nUM mwrn vwly (klMikq krn vwly goqm irSI) ho, ikqy qusIN iesqrI sihq plMG vwly (igRhsqI) ho Aqy ikqy qusIN Su`Dqw dw swr-q`qÍ ho (ArQwq suK suivDw qoN pry ho)

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) akala(n)k kahoo(n) maarat maya(n)k kahoo(n) pooran praja(n)k kahoo(n) sa'udhataa kee saar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ अकलंक कहूँ मारत मयंक कहूँ पूरन प्रजंक कहूँ सु्ुधता की सार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں اکلںک کهُوں مارت مےںک کهُوں پُورن پرجںک کهُوں سّدھتا کیِ سار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM dyv Drm khUM swDnw ky hrm khUM kuqsq kukrm khUM Drm ky pRkwr ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou performest godly rituals, somewhere Thou art the Abode of religious discipline, somewhere Thou art the vicious actions and somewhere Thou art the vicious actions and somewhere Thou appearest in variety of virtuous acts.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN dyv-DrmI ho Aqy ikqy vsIilAW (swDnw) dy mh`l (BMfwr) ho, ikqy inMdwXog kukrm (krn vwly) ho Aqy ikqy Drm dy Anyk FMg ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) dhev dharam kahoo(n) saadhanaa ke haram kahoo(n) kutasat kukaram kahoo(n) dharam ke prakaar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ देव धरम कहूँ साधना के हरम कहूँ कुतसत कुकरम कहूँ धरम के प्रकार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں دےو دھرم کهُوں سادھنا کے هرم کهُوں کُتست کُکرم کهُوں دھرم کے پرکار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM paun AhwrI khUM ibidAw ky bIcwrI khUM jogI jqI bRhmcwrI nr khUM nwr ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou subsistest on air, somewhere Thou art a learned thinker and somewhere Thou art a Yogi, a Celibate, a Brahmchari ( disciplined student), a man and a womean.

pu.ss: ikqy pOx dw Awhwr krn vwly ho, ikqy ividAw dw ivcwr krn vwly (ivdvwn) ho, ikqy jogI, jqI, bRhmcwrI, purS Aqy nwrI ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy pOx dw Awhwr krn vwly ho, ikqy ividAw dw ivcwr krn vwly (ivdvwn) ho, ikqy jogI, jqI, bRhmcwrI, purS Aqy nwrI ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) paun ahaaree kahoo(n) bidhiaa ke beechaaree kahoo(n) jogee jatee brahamachaaree nar kahoo(n) naar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ पउन अहारी कहूँ बिदिआ के बीचारी कहूँ जोगी जती ब्रहमचारी नर कहूँ नार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں پان اهاریِ کهُوں بدآ کے بیِچاریِ کهُوں جوگیِ جتیِ برهمچاریِ نر کهُوں نار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM CqRDwrI khUM Cwlw Dry CYl BwrI khUM CkvwrI khUM Cl ky pRkwr ho ]7]17]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art a mighty sovereign, somewhere Thou art a great preceptor sitting on a deer-skin, somewhere Thou art prone to be deceived and somewhere Thou art various types of deception Thyself. 7.17.

pu.ss: ikqy CqRDwrI (rwjy) imRgCwlw-DwrI (sMinAwsI) ho, ikqy bhuq suMdr nOjvwn Aqy ikqy inrbl SrIr vwly ('CkvwrI') Aqy ikqy Cl dy Anyk rUp ho ]7]17]
pu.bdb: ikqy CqRDwrI (rwjy) imRgCwlw-DwrI (sMinAwsI) ho, ikqy bhuq suMdr nOjvwn Aqy ikqy inrbl SrIr vwly ('CkvwrI') Aqy ikqy Cl dy Anyk rUp ho ]7]17]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) chhatradhaaree kahoo(n) chhaalaa dhare chhail bhaaree kahoo(n) chhakavaaree kahoo(n) chhal ke prakaar ho ||7||17||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ छत्रधारी कहूँ छाला धरे छैल भारी कहूँ छकवारी कहूँ छल के प्रकार हो ॥७॥१७॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں چھتردھاریِ کهُوں چھالا دھرے چھَےل بھاریِ کهُوں چھکواریِ کهُوں چھل کے پرکار هو ۔۔۷۔۔۱۷۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM gIq ky gv`Xw khUM byn ky bj`Xw khUM inRq ky nc`Xw khUM nr ko Akwr ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art singer of song somewhere Thou art player of flute, somewhere Thou art a dancer and somewhere in the form of a man.

pu.ss: ikqy gIqw dy gwx vwly ho, ikqy bMsrI vjwaux vwly ho, ikqy nwc dy ncwr ho Aqy ikqy nr srUp vwly ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy gIqw dy gwx vwly ho, ikqy bMsrI vjwaux vwly ho, ikqy nwc dy ncwr ho Aqy ikqy nr srUp vwly ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) geet ke gava'yaa kahoo(n) ben ke baja'yaa kahoo(n) nirat ke nacha'yaa kahoo(n) nar ko akaar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ गीत के गवय्या कहूँ बेन के बजय्या कहूँ नृत के नचय्या कहूँ नर को अकार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں گیِت کے گوّےا کهُوں بےن کے بجّےا کهُوں نرت کے نچّےا کهُوں نر کو اکار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byd bwnI khUM kok kI khwnI khUM rwjw khUM rwnI khUM nwr ky pRkwr ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art the vedic hymns and somewhere the story of the elucidator of the mystery of love,  somewhere Thou art Thyself the king, the queen and also various types of woman.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN vyd-bwxI ho, ikqy kwm dy Bydw dw ibR`qwq ho, ikqy rwjy ho, ikqy rwxI ho Aqy ikqy qusIN iesqrI dy v`K v`K srUp ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN vyd-bwxI ho, ikqy kwm dy Bydw dw ibR`qwq ho, ikqy rwjy ho, ikqy rwxI ho Aqy ikqy qusIN iesqrI dy v`K v`K srUp ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bedh baanee kahoo(n) kok kee kahaanee kahoo(n) raajaa kahoo(n) raanee kahoo(n) naar ke prakaar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेद बानी कहूँ कोक की कहानी कहूँ राजा कहूँ रानी कहूँ नार के प्रकार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےد بانیِ کهُوں کوک کیِ کهانیِ کهُوں راجا کهُوں رانیِ کهُوں نار کے پرکار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byn ky bj`Xw khUM Dyn ky cr`Xw khUM lwKn lv`Xw khUM suMdr kumwr ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art the player of flute, somewhere the grazier of cows and somewhere Thou art the beautiful youth, enticer of lakhs (of lovely maids.)

pu.ss: ikqy bMsrI vjwaux vwly, ikqy gaUAW nUM crwaux vwly, ikqy (ivArQ dIAW) qohmqw lgvwaux vwly Aqy ikqy suMdr kumwr ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy bMsrI vjwaux vwly, ikqy gaUAW nUM crwaux vwly, ikqy (ivArQ dIAW) qohmqw lgvwaux vwly Aqy ikqy suMdr kumwr ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) ben ke baja'yaa kahoo(n) dhen ke chara'yaa kahoo(n) laakhan lava'yaa kahoo(n) su(n)dhar kumaar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेन के बजय्या कहूँ धेन के चरय्या कहूँ लाखन लवय्या कहूँ सुँदर कुमार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےن کے بجّےا کهُوں دھےن کے چرّےا کهُوں لاکھن لوّےا کهُوں سُںدر کُمار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: suDqw kI swn ho ik sMqn ky pRwn ho ik dwqw mhw dwn ho ik inRdoKI inrMkwr ho ]8]18]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art the splendour of Purity, the life of the saints, the Donor of great charities and the immaculate Formless Lord. 8.18.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN pivqrqw dI Swn ho, jw sMqw dy pRwx ho jw mhwn dwn dyx vwly dwnI ho jw inrdoS inrwkwr ho ]8]18]
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN pivqrqw dI Swn ho, jw sMqw dy pRwx ho jw mhwn dwn dyx vwly dwnI ho jw inrdoS inrwkwr ho ]8]18]

transliteration.en: sudhataa kee saan ho k sa(n)tan ke praan ho k dhaataa mahaa dhaan ho k niradhokhee nira(n)kaar ho ||8||18||
transliteration.hi: सुधता की सान हो कि संतन के प्रान हो कि दाता महा दान हो कि नृदोखी निरंकार हो ॥८॥१८॥
transliteration.ur: سُدھتا کیِ سان هو ک سںتن کے پران هو ک داتا مها دان هو ک نردوکھیِ نرںکار هو ۔۔۸۔۔۱۸۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: inrjur inrUp ho ik suMdr srUp ho ik BUpn ky BUp ho ik dwqw mhw dwn ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Thou art the Invisible Cataract, the Most Beautiful Entity, the King of Kings and the Donor of great charities.

pu.ss: (hy pRBU!) qusIN inrog Aqy ArUp ho jw suMdr srUp vwly ho, jw rwijAW dy rwjy ho jw mhwn dwn krn vwly dwnI ho।
pu.bdb: (hy pRBU!) qusIN inrog Aqy ArUp ho jw suMdr srUp vwly ho, jw rwijAW dy rwjy ho jw mhwn dwn krn vwly dwnI ho।

transliteration.en: nirajur niroop ho k su(n)dhar saroop ho k bhoopan ke bhoop ho k dhaataa mahaa dhaan ho ||
transliteration.hi: निरजुर निरूप हो कि सुँदर सरूप हो कि भूपन के भूप हो कि दाता महा दान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: نِرجر نرُوپ هو ک سُںدر سرُوپ هو ک بھُوپن کے بھُوپ هو ک داتا مها دان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: pRwn ky bc`Xw dUD pUq ky idv`Xw rog sog ky imt`Xw ikDO mwnI mhw mwn ho ]

en.bdb: Thou art the Saviour of life, the Giver of milk and offspring, the Remover of ailments and sufferings and somewhere Thou art the Lord of Highest Honour.

pu.ss: qusIN pRwxw dI riKAW krn vwly ho jw du`D pu`qr bKSx vwly ho jw rog Aqy sog nUM imtwaux vwly ho jw v`fy AiBmwn vwly AiBmwnI ho।
pu.bdb: qusIN pRwxw dI riKAW krn vwly ho jw du`D pu`qr bKSx vwly ho jw rog Aqy sog nUM imtwaux vwly ho jw v`fy AiBmwn vwly AiBmwnI ho।

transliteration.en: praan ke bacha'yaa dhoodh poot ke dhiva'yaa rog sog ke miTa'yaa kidhau maanee mahaa maan ho ||
transliteration.hi: प्रान के बचय्या दूध पूत के दिवय्या रोग सोग के मिटय्या किधौ मानी महा मान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: پران کے بچّےا دُودھ پُوت کے دوّےا روگ سوگ کے مٹّےا کدھَو مانیِ مها مان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ibidAw ky ibcwr ho ik AdÍY Avqwr ho ik is`Dqw kI sUriq ho ik suDqw kI swn ho ]

en.bdb: Thou art the essence of all learning, the embodiment of monism, the Being of All-Powers and the Glory of Sanctification.

pu.ss: qusIN ividAw dw ivcwr (ivdvwn) ho jw AdÍYq-srUp vwly ho, jw is`DIAW dI pRiqmUrqI ho, jw Su`Dqw dw gOrv ho।
pu.bdb: qusIN ividAw dw ivcwr (ivdvwn) ho jw AdÍYq-srUp vwly ho, jw is`DIAW dI pRiqmUrqI ho, jw Su`Dqw dw gOrv ho।

transliteration.en: bidhiaa ke bichaar ho k adhavai avataar ho k si'dhataa kee soorat ho k sudhataa kee saan ho ||
transliteration.hi: बिदिआ के बिचार हो कि अद्वै अवतार हो कि सिद्धता की सूरति हो कि सुधता की सान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: بِدآ کے بچار هو ک ادوَے اوتار هو ک سّدھتا کیِ سُورت هو ک سُدھتا کیِ سان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jobn ky jwl ho ik kwl hUM ky kwl ho ik sqRn ky sUl ho ik imqRn ky pRwn ho ]9]19]

en.bdb: Thou art the snare of youth, the Death of Death, the anguish of enemies and the life of the friends. 9.19.

pu.ss: qusIN jvwnI dy jwl (AwkriSq kr ky moh bMDn ivc Pswaux vwly) ho, jw kwl dy vI kwl ho, jw vYrIAW leI pIVwkwrI ho, jw imqrw leI pRwx-rUp ho ]9]19]
pu.bdb: qusIN jvwnI dy jwl (AwkriSq kr ky moh bMDn ivc Pswaux vwly) ho, jw kwl dy vI kwl ho, jw vYrIAW leI pIVwkwrI ho, jw imqrw leI pRwx-rUp ho ]9]19]

transliteration.en: joban ke jaal ho k kaal hoo(n) ke kaal ho k satran ke sool ho k mitran ke praan ho ||9||19||
transliteration.hi: जोबन के जाल हो कि काल हूँ के काल हो कि सत्रन के सूल हो कि मित्रन के प्रान हो ॥९॥१९॥
transliteration.ur: جوبن کے جال هو ک کال هُوں کے کال هو ک سترن کے سُول هو ک مترن کے پران هو ۔۔۹۔۔۱۹۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM bRhm bwd khUM ibidAw ko ibKwd khUM nwd ko nnwd khUM pUrn Bgq ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art in defic conduct, somewhere Thou appearest as contention in learning somewhere Thou art the tune of sound and somewhere a perfect saint (attuned with celestial strain).

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN bRhm sMbMDI ivcwr-crcw ho, jw ividAw dy qrk-ivqrk ho, jw ikqy Anhd nwd dI Dun ho, jw ikqy (Anhd nwd dI Dun ivc) pUrI qrRhw lIn Bgq ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN bRhm sMbMDI ivcwr-crcw ho, jw ividAw dy qrk-ivqrk ho, jw ikqy Anhd nwd dI Dun ho, jw ikqy (Anhd nwd dI Dun ivc) pUrI qrRhw lIn Bgq ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) braham baadh kahoo(n) bidhiaa ko bikhaadh kahoo(n) naadh ko nanaadh kahoo(n) pooran bhagat ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ ब्रहम बाद कहूँ बिदिआ को बिखाद कहूँ नाद को ननाद कहूँ पूरन भगत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں برهم باد کهُوں بدآ کو بکھاد کهُوں ناد کو نناد کهُوں پُورن بھگت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byd rIq khUM ibidAw kI pRqIq khUM nIq Aau AnIq khUM juAwlw sI jgq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art Vedic ritual, somewhere the love for learning, somewhere ethical and unethical, and somewhere appearest as the glow of fire.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN vyd-rIq dy pwlk ho, ikqy ividAw dI pRqIqI (ivSvws) ho, ikqy nIqI ho Aqy ikqy AnIqI ho Aqy ikqy A`g vwg cmkdy ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN vyd-rIq dy pwlk ho, ikqy ividAw dI pRqIqI (ivSvws) ho, ikqy nIqI ho Aqy ikqy AnIqI ho Aqy ikqy A`g vwg cmkdy ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bedh reet kahoo(n) bidhiaa kee prateet kahoo(n) neet aau aneet kahoo(n) juaalaa see jagat ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेद रीत कहूँ बिदिआ की प्रतीत कहूँ नीत अउ अनीत कहूँ जुआला सी जगत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےد ریِت کهُوں بدآ کیِ پرتیِت کهُوں نیِت اا انیِت کهُوں جُآلا سیِ جگت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: pUrn pRqwp khUM iekwqI ko jwp khUM qwp ko Aqwp khUM jog qy ifgq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art perfectly Glorious, somewhere engrossed in solitary recitation, somewhere Remover of Suffering in great Agony and somewhere Thou appearest as a fallen yogi.

pu.ss: ikqy pUrn pRqwp vwly ho, ikqy eykwq-vwsI (swDk) dy jwp ho, ikqy qpisAw (duAwrw pRwpq nw kIqy jw skx vwly) Akwl purK (Aqwp) ho Aqy ikqy jog-swDnw qoN ifgx vwly ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy pUrn pRqwp vwly ho, ikqy eykwq-vwsI (swDk) dy jwp ho, ikqy qpisAw (duAwrw pRwpq nw kIqy jw skx vwly) Akwl purK (Aqwp) ho Aqy ikqy jog-swDnw qoN ifgx vwly ho।

transliteration.en: pooran prataap kahoo(n) ikaatee ko jaap kahoo(n) taap ko ataap kahoo(n) jog te ddigat ho ||
transliteration.hi: पूरन प्रताप कहूँ इकाती को जाप कहूँ ताप को अताप कहूँ जोग ते डिगत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: پُورن پرتاپ کهُوں اکاتیِ کو جاپ کهُوں تاپ کو اتاپ کهُوں جوگ تے ڈگت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM br dyq khUM Cl isau iCnwie lyq srb kwl srb Taur eyk sy lgq ho ]10]20]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou bestowest the Boon and somewhere withdraw it with deceit. Thou at all times and at all the places Thou comest into view as the same. 10.20.

pu.ss: ikqy vr dyx vwly ho ikqy Cl nwl Koh lYx vwly ho, (mYnUM) sB simAW ivc Aqy sBnw iTkwixAW ivc iek-smwn pRqIq huMdy ho ]10]20]
pu.bdb: ikqy vr dyx vwly ho ikqy Cl nwl Koh lYx vwly ho, (mYnUM) sB simAW ivc Aqy sBnw iTkwixAW ivc iek-smwn pRqIq huMdy ho ]10]20]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bar dhet kahoo(n) chhal siau chhinai let sarab kaal sarab Thaur ek se lagat ho ||10||20||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बर देत कहूँ छल सिउ छिनाइ लेत सरब काल सरब ठउर एक से लगत हो ॥१०॥२०॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بر دےت کهُوں چھل سا چھناا لےت سرب کال سرب ٹھار اےک سے لگت هو ۔۔۱۰۔۔۲۰۔۔
